channel.title: Happy 4th of July!
channel.description:
I know all of you here can't take a fucking joke, or have to be so pathetic over little things, but I just wanted to say Happy 4th of July!!!
What are you guys planning to do this July? Anything new?

item.title: Happy 4th of July!
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Chassy13:

jjones, why would you add atrox_'s post into your signature? Not everybody lives in the US you know, and Europe does not celebrate the 4th of july.

I just thought it was funny lol. Sorry i affended, i’ll take it off

Read full topic

item.title: Happy 4th of July!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

jjones, why would you add atrox_'s post into your signature? Not everybody lives in the US you know, and Europe does not celebrate the 4th of july.

I am going to do nothing. It really isn’t anything big to me, I just set off fireworks when I feel like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy 4th of July!
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:15, topic:286796”][quote author=Newty link=topic=379269.msg2852449#msg2852449 date=1246624785]

Im gonna get really high on shrooms and watch the Denver fireworks show.
Fireworks are always better on shrooms.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2009, 01:54:31 am[/size][hr]Dude its only the 3rd…

Dude…

I have never even thought about a firework show on a psychedelic drug. Thanks for the awesome idea.

Too bad you can’t afford shit, so it looks like you’ll be pickin your own shrooms.
[/quote]

edit I calculated it wrong the first time, I can afford 493 grams. If I flip those I’ll have enough for double that amount. Enough to go to jail for a long long time :([/quote]
Its worth it bro. The fireworks are 3D and they move, and i cant explain everything else. Just do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy 4th of July!
item.dc:creator: @_Jake2 `Jake
item.description:
@_Jake2 wrote:

Ya today is july 3rd and I am actually planning something really fun =)

Me and my family are going out to california to go to the beach and watch the fireworks saturday night. Then on sunday we are going to the most amazing place on earth. SIX FLAGS BITCH!
It’s gonna be so fucking fun.
